## Research Experience

**Research Assistant** \| Epidemiology, Bloomberg School of Public Health \| June 2024 - Present

Working on a project focusing on human seroprevalence for different infectious pathogens which can be measured by Luminex assays. This project is funded by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. Advisors- Drs. Saki Takahashi and Sonia Tara Hegde.

**Master of Public Health Thesis** \| January 2023-May 2023

Cross-sectional study comprising of data collection, data cleaning and analysis using statistical software packages. Thesis title- “Investigating use of antibiotics and knowledge about antimicrobial resistance among pharmacy students in Bangladeshi Universities”

**Master of Pharmacy Thesis** \| March 2018-February 2019

Lab work comprising of hydro distillation, organic phase partitioning, cytotoxicity assay, antioxidant activity using DPPH assay method, thrombolytic activity, antimicrobial screening using disc diffusion method.

**Bachelor of Professional Pharmacy Project** \| January 2016-May 2016

Survey of patients diagnosed with respiratory tract infection (RTI) and surgical site infection (SSI) and observing the antibiotic sensitivity pattern among them.
